snippet.title: STILL WAKES THE DEEP | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
It is with great pride that today we announce our return to the Narrative Horror genre - our next title STILL WAKES THE DEEP is out on PC & consoles in early 2024.

December 1975. Disaster strikes the Beira D oil rig off the coast of Scotland. Navigate the collapsing rig to save your crew from an otherworldly horror on the edge of all logic and reality. 

Wishlist now - https://www.stillwakesthedeep.com

The Chinese Room on social media:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thechineseroombrighton
LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-chinese-room-ltd/
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/TheChineseRoom/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@the_chinese_room
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ChineseRoom
Website - https://www.thechineseroom.co.uk/
Monthly Newsletter - https://www.eepurl.com/ho-5Of
